DOC.brief_summary: Compare clinical competence undergraduate nursing student ' mashhad nursing midwifery school two group apply nursing process ( paper- base versus electronic ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Applying Paper- Based Versus Electronic Nursing Process Clinical Competence Nursing Student
DOC.detailed_description: The sample consist least 30 nursing student group A ( paper-based nursing process PNP ) B ( Electronic nursing process ENP ) base random allocation ( lottery sector ) divide two group . The level knowledge nursing process , clinical competency clinical decision make evaluate knowledge nursing process , Meretoja competence modify Lauri clinical decision making questionnaire , investigator . Then , group separately-training program aim education nurse process ( include definition nursing process , advantage implementation collect data use patient assessment form Gordon ) form workshop day ( 5 hour ) implement . Nursing process education two group similar two hour program group devote practical training implement . After complete train program , student learn nurse process determine way . Then two week , student Group A Group B implement paper electronic nursing process patient researcher perform guidance closely monitor . Clinical competence clinical decision making assessed end course previous method . Satisfaction nursing process group measure .
DOC.criteria: Willingness participate study No Experience work independently ( student work , employment , etc . ) Nurse . Participate first day internship program Failure complete course training
DOC.keyword: clinical competence , nurse process , nursing student
